snippet: A look at some Web sites that aim to help children and their parents track chores, allowances, savings and spending — and maybe teach some financial literacy in the process.
abstract: Ron Lieber Your Money column examines several Web sites that aim to help children and their parents track chores, allowances, savings and spending, teaching financial literacy in the process.
lead_paragraph: A look at some Web sites that aim to help children and their parents track chores, allowances, savings and spending — and maybe teach some financial literacy in the process.

headline.print_headline: Managing a Child’s Allowance, the Online Version
headline.seo: Managing a Child’s Allowance, the Online Version
headline.main: Managing a Child’s Allowance, the Online Version
